To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private StandardDeviation _std;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_std = STD(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_std.IsReady)
{
    var current = _std.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.std = self.STD(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.std.IsReady:
    current = self.std.Current.Value
